Name: Wibble
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As Dick Bradsell once said to me, "It may make you wobble, but it won't make you fall down." Dick named this cocktail after the 1970s' Weebles children's roly-poly toys which were advertised with the catchphrase, "Weebles wobble, but they don't fall down."
History: Created in 1999 by Dick Bradsell at The Player, London, England for Nick Blacknell - a conspicuous lover of gin.
Nutrition: One serving of Wibble contains 192 calories
